title: Chiens Perdus Sans Collier = Lost Dogs Without Collar
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Gilbert Cesbron.
description: Judge Lamy is presiding the Juvenile Court. Under a rough outlook, he is hiding a deep sense of compassion for all the young peole in trouble he tries to help. One day, the young Alain-Robert is brought before him, charged with setting fire to his employer's farm as a revenge for all the beatings he received. Later on, Francis, gets caught stealing in the changing rooms of a football club.  Credits: Director, Jean Delannoy ; writers, Jean Aurenche, Pierre Bost, Francois Boyer ; photography, Pierre Montazel ; music, Paul Misraki. Cast: Jean Gabin, Anne Doat, Serge Lecointe, Jacques Moulieres, Dora Doll, Jane Marken.
